attributes.action: ignore the requests of urban 4x4 owners as they try to justify the reasons why they purchased their vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reading the petitions from "victimised" 4X4 owners makes me laugh, one states that if the govenment hadn't closed off country lanes to 4X4's they would have a place to drive them in the way they were designed:
A) as if 4X4 owners would go off road in their £40k machines (they wont even be insured to go off road).
B) they should have checked about countryside restrictions on the use of motorvehicles before they fell for the exotic TV advert for their 4X4.
As for the tax, Farmers and any other worker who needs a 4X4 will aquire a 4X4 licence - free of charge, but those who have absolutely no reason to own one should pay £6000/year for the privelage.
Your Freedom? Government should be able to choose which cars that we can drive, especially if some are uneconomic, gas-guzzling tanks that are not safe and not clever.
